Transaction State Context.Deposit State: When users send Ether and call the deposit function.
Transaction State Context.Withdrawal State: When users withdraw specified amounts via the withdraw function.
Transaction State Context.Refund State: When users attempt to withdraw all funds using the refund function.

External Interactions.Ether Transfer: The contract transfers Ether between users and the contract in deposit and withdraw functions.
External Interactions.Emergency Migration: The contract can transfer its balance to another address through migrateTo in emergencies.
